Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. If you don’t control that creature, scry 1. [i](It can’t be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 white Elemental creature token.
For each player, you create a 1/1 white Elemental creature token unless that player pays {2}.
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If an opponent controls that creature, it gains indestructible until end of turn.
When Cryonic Instructor enters the battlefield, tap up to one target creature and untap up to one other target creature.

As an additional cost to cast Explore the Beyond, return a creature you control to its owner’s hand.
Draw two cards.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand. Until your next turn, whenever a player casts a spell with the same name as that permanent, each of that player’s opponents draws a card.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap step.
{2}{U}: Return Lost in Thought to its owner’s hand. Scry 1.
Exile target creature. Its controller may put it into their hand or onto the battlefield tapped.
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. If that creature is attacking a player other than you, draw a card.

Cooperation [i](Any player may spend mana to pay for {3}.)[/i]

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Target opponent draws two cards.
You draw a card and you lose 1 life. If a creature died this turn, instead you draw two cards and lose 2 life.
Each opponent discards a card. For each opponent who discarded a creature card, you create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent who discarded a noncreature card loses 2 life.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature you control blocks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
[0]: Create a 1/1 white and green Cleric creature token with lifelink.
[-8]: For each creature you control, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

Whenever Kivnith deals combat damage to a player, return target nonland permanent that player controls to its owner’s hand, then that player discards a card.

When Rinn, Crumbling Ruler dies, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Eternity Tunnel.
{2}, {T}: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of charge counters on Eternity Tunnel, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

{T}: Add {C}.

The first time a creature you control would leave the battlefield each turn, instead exile it, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

{T}: Add {C}.
{X}, {T}, Remove X charge counters from Ruins of Telenia: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
